thread.title: Cheryl and Liam Payne to raise child at One Direction star's mansion
thread.title_full: Cheryl and Liam Payne to raise child at One Direction star's mansion

author: Halina Watts
title: Cheryl and Liam Payne to raise child at One Direction star's mansion
text:
Celebs Cheryl and Liam Payne to raise child at One Direction star's mansion A source says the star pair have settled in nicely to Liam’s posh six bedroom £5.1million mansion which has now been baby proofed Share Liam's Surrey mansion has been baby proofed (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The pitter patter of tiny feet will soon be Fighting For This Love at the Chery l/ Liam Payne residency. 
And I can reveal the lovebirds, who are celebrating their first anniversary, are going to raise their tot at Liam’s swanky gaff in Surrey. 
My source reveals the pair have settled in nicely to Liam’s posh six bedroom £5.1million mansion which has now been baby proofed. 
The source explains: “Cheryl spent all of Christmas at Liam’s, and she loves it there. That is going to be where they live together in the UK. They already have lots of amazing memories. Read More Spoilt rotten! Cheryl gave her assistant, Lily England, the best 30th birthday present EVER Cheryl reportedly 'loves it' at Liam's place (Photo: Getty) 
“She is still going to have her house in Hertfordshire but she’ll be based with Liam in Surrey.” 
Liam, 23, is currently in LA where he is putting the finishing touches to his album which I’m told will not be a “pleasant shock” for his army of fans. 
Meanwhile Cheryl, 33, is making final preparations for her new arrival. Earlier this week buggy company Silver Cross, which is a firm favourite of the royals, was spotted delivering goods to the couple’s house . 
And former One Direction star Niall Horan, 23, let slip that Liam was “nervous” about becoming a dad . I reckon he’ll be alright... Like us on Facebook
